glsa.title: GLib Networking: Improper certificate validation
glsa.synopsis: GLib Networking was not properly verifying TLS certificates in all circumstances, possibly allowing an integrity/confidentiality compromise.

description.p: GTlsClientConnection skips hostname verification of the serverâ€™s TLS certificate if the application fails to specify the expected server identity.

impact.p: There may be a breach of integrity or confidentiality in connections made using GLib Networking.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GLib Networking users should upgrade to the latest version:
